sentences.english: The heart is one of first organs to form during organogenesis in the vertebrate.
sentences.chinese: 心臟是脊椎動物器官發生過程中最早形成的器官之一。

sentences.english: Most muscle and spinal injuries are from overstrain .
sentences.chinese: 大多數肌肉損傷和脊椎的問題都來自用力過度。

sentences.english: Demonstrate ability to use spine immobilization techniques in trauma victims.
sentences.chinese: 有能在創傷患者身上使用脊椎板固定技巧。

sentences.english: When it occurs in the back near the spinal cord or the nerve roots, it can be very painful.
sentences.chinese: 如果正好發生在脊椎或神經附近的話會非常痛苦。

sentences.english: This is the web page of Invertebrate Systematics.
sentences.chinese: 這是無脊椎動物系統分類學的網頁。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the understanding of the radioactive charcteristics of vertebral eosinophilic granuloma.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲了提高對脊椎骨嗜酸性肉芽腫的認識。

sentences.english: Many species of invertebrate have shells or skeletons made of calcium carbonate.
sentences.chinese: 無脊椎類的好多物種有碳酸鈣質的外殼或骨骼。

sentences.english: Spondylolysis is a break in the pars interarticularis.
sentences.chinese: 脊椎滑脫是峽部連續性的中斷。

sentences.english: Your posture of reading and writing must be proper, or you will get spondylopathy.
sentences.chinese: 看書寫字的姿勢一定要端正，否則容易得脊椎病。

sentences.english: The team found that the key appears to be joints in the bony vertebrae that wrap protectively around the spinal cord.
sentences.chinese: 這個團隊發現起關鍵作用的是包圍脊索的脊椎骨關節。

sentences.english: There aremore than a thousand sea anemone species.
sentences.chinese: 海葵是無脊椎動物，有一千多個品種。

sentences.english: Only Huoquan treat spinal pain and heel pain.
sentences.chinese: 單用火全治脊椎痛及足跟痛。

sentences.english: Measurement of stiffness during simulated spinal physiotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 剛度測量中模擬脊椎物理治療。

sentences.english: The doctor said my back was hurt because my spinal core was inflamed.
sentences.chinese: 醫生說我背部痛是因爲我脊椎神經發炎了。

sentences.english: The invertebrate gelatinous form was capable of emitting a deadly bioelectrical charge.
sentences.chinese: 梅杜扎的無脊椎凝膠狀身體能釋放致命的生物電。

sentences.english: This is the first documented case of a plant living in partnership, or symbiosis, with a vertebrate.
sentences.chinese: 這是首個被記錄在案的植物與脊椎動物共生的例子。

definition: cervical vertebra/the seven cervical vertebrae in the neck of humans and most mammals
thoracic vertebra/the twelve thoracic vertebras behind the ribcage of humans and most mammals
sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
